Articles.Content: I wish there was more metalic items in this pack.

While I absolutely love the looks of this mod, my framerate took a drastic nosedive when I tried to launch a rocket consisting of two FuelTowers and four black powder rockets around them. The craft file is shared from my dropbox.

Is this happening to you guys too? If so, what can be done about it? I really really really would like to land a barrel on my nearest Class E asteroid and mine some Space Whale Oil

I wish there was more metalic items in this pack.

More metal items are coming, eventually

While I absolutely love the looks of this mod, my framerate took a drastic nosedive when I tried to launch a rocket consisting of two FuelTowers and four black powder rockets around them. The craft file is shared from my dropbox.

Is this happening to you guys too? If so, what can be done about it? I really really really would like to land a barrel on my nearest Class E asteroid and mine some Space Whale Oil

I am currently skinny-ing down the file size to hopefully help it run better, some of the spherical parts can cause framerate drops as they have alot of triangles making up their surface.

Texturing is also getting a workover....

its all very tedious... but i will get there soon:rolleyes:

... land a barrel on my nearest Class E asteroid and mine some Space Whale Oil

By the way... How about a properly Steampunked version of the Klaw? Then, we could go and anchor a Spelljammer ship without relying on parts with pesky that Black-And-White-NASA looks.

After all, we need to hunt down all those Space Whales so the Space Kraken does starve

By the way... How about a properly Steampunked version of the Klaw? Then, we could go and anchor a Spelljammer ship without relying on parts with pesky that Black-And-White-NASA looks.

After all, we need to hunt down all those Space Whales so the Space Kraken does starve

I agree, I will be putting aside some time to try to re-create the claw...

Sorry about delays... I cannot get texture sharing to work

I will continue with developement on parts instead

Just got to playing with this. Some of the timber parts should be just the ticket for my planned luxury yacht.

Also noticed the Water Boiler consumes NitrousOxide but stores Oxidizer. Is that deliberate or a mistake?
When the clockwork probes are released will there be a module manager file to give them RemoteTech 2 Compatibility?

RemoteTech wouldn't make sense because it's steampunk. Even the Transmographr is a stretch.

Also, this reminded me of this.

Just got to playing with this. Some of the timber parts should be just the ticket for my planned luxury yacht.

Also noticed the Water Boiler consumes NitrousOxide but stores Oxidizer. Is that deliberate or a mistake?

That would be an oversight from the quality control department, my apologies

When the clockwork probes are released will there be a module manager file to give them RemoteTech 2 Compatibility?

Not sure yet, I will see. Looking for inspiration at the moment...

OK, new release out now....

Dropbox Link Kerb-Fu v0.17a

There are some new station parts, bug-fixes and tweaks.

Will have a curseforge link up as soon as the site lets me upload the file.

Please post photos of your vessels or stations. It could lead to inspiration and more parts!
"You cannot give Reputation to the same post twice."

"You cannot give Reputation to the same post twice."

Thankyou, very much for giving it the first time

Ok, I think I have cracked texture sharing, works on my test install anyway

I need testers and feedback if anyone is interested

Here is a test install link for shared textures version, No new parts from v0.17a, but the file is only 12Mb now...

File structure has changed and some part names are different, so this will probably break saves...

anyway.... Dropbox Link Kerb-fu v0.18a

remember to remove your old Kerb-fu folder before you unpack this....

thanks
Those parts look very nice! Can't wait to try them I'll help you test too, if you need someone. Just PM me with details

Liking the new station parts, and not spotted any bugs with the texture sharing so far. Would it not be more versatile to make the wide end on the station domes fit flush with other 2.5 m parts though?

Also, you've got the description in the manufacturer field for the station dome (the lighting one).
Where's the hatch on the station dome and module? IVA? Some more 2.5 meter parts would be cool.

So I was trying to find the awesome steampunk RC creations of this awesome guy, and I didn't remember the name of the website. I do remember he made a steampunk drawing tutorial, so I searched for that and I found out that that website's name is Crabfu Steamworks. This explains the name Kerb-Fu, I'm guessing.

So I was trying to find the awesome steampunk RC creations of this awesome guy, and I didn't remember the name of the website. I do remember he made a steampunk drawing tutorial, so I searched for that and I found out that that website's name is Crabfu Steamworks. This explains the name Kerb-Fu, I'm guessing.

Nothing to do with me sorry, but it sounds like I should check it out for inspiration maybe

Where's the hatch on the station dome and module? IVA? Some more 2.5 meter parts would be cool.

Getting there slowly... very slowly lately

Liking the new station parts, and not spotted any bugs with the texture sharing so far. Would it not be more versatile to make the wide end on the station domes fit flush with other 2.5 m parts though?

Also, you've got the description in the manufacturer field for the station dome (the lighting one).

will fix bug for next version, cheers!

I was going for a modular look, but I was thinking of some intermediate assemblies to tie things more seamlessly
